member.param: A object, specifying the Ribbon control to be assigned to the property.
A object, specifying the Ribbon status bar to be assigned to the property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraPrinting.Preview.RibbonControllerBase.RibbonControl

summary.para: Gets or sets the class instance to which the Ribbon Controller belongs.

member.value: A class instance to which the Ribbon Controller belongs.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraPrinting.Preview.RibbonControllerBase.RibbonStatusBar

summary.para: Gets or sets the class instance to which the Ribbon Controller belongs.

member.value: A class instance to which the Ribbon Controller belongs.
